description: We’re the market leader in tech-enabled hospitality.

Guest Experience.Title: We built an experience people love...

Testimonial.Quote: We travel frequently with our friend group from all over the country and we found this amazing space... We had never stayed in a Sonder rental before but we will never stay anywhere else again if we have the option!
Testimonial.Author: Lynette

Guest issue rate.Chart: Bar chart with a downward trend line

Key Points.01: Connected home initiative reduced access issues.
Key Points.02: QA process implementation, dispatch app improvements, and third party housekeeping incentive plans allows us to identify even more minor issues before guests check-in.

Guest Experience.Title: We accommodated hundreds of thousands of diverse guests.

Guest Experience.Question: What do they want out of a place to stay?

Description: The lobby is on your phone
No tipping and free, fast wifi

title: We transformed the hospitality operating model with technology.
subtitle: Unit Economics

title: Unit Economics
subtitle: We built a very strong business model.

footer_note: Note: Assumes CapEx refresh at year 6.

title: In 2018 we completely transformed our unit economics.
Our markets are generating an increasing amount of contribution...
subtitle: Annualized contribution per unit ($) by market-cohort

title: Unit Economics
subtitle: ...making all of our markets with over 100 live units profitable.

key_points.01: Following our unit economics success, we turned our attention to growth and in H2 added supply that will generate 148M of annualized revenue.
key_points.02: Our productivity per person has increased from 7 to 30 units per month over the last 12 months.
key_points.03: Our average deal size is now 19 units (vs 5 units as of YE 2017), and we currently have 2,400 units signed or in lease negotiation for Q1.

Compliance.Zoning: All new units are commercially zoned and eligible for hotel or transient licensing
Compliance.ADA: Compliance with ADA guidelines in all non-exempt properties
Compliance.Taxation: Pay relevant tourism, value added and municipal taxes
Compliance.Fire & Safety: Compliant with all local fire and safety requirements
Compliance.Inspections: City staff available to assist regulators for periodic inspections

subtitle: We identified all developments in the US.

content.text: In 2019 we will finally lay the foundations for what will become an iconic consumer brand.

Defensibility.Statement: The larger we are, the more we will leverage our scale to dominate supply and demand...

Defensibility.Goal: We’re aiming to be the largest hospitality brand in the world by 2025...

03.Description: Requires going from 21 productive cities to 105 productive cities at the same city growth velocity.

Defensibility.Positioning Statement: ...and are uniquely positioned to take on three other trillion dollar verticals.

Team.Name: Sanjay Banker
Team.Title: CFO
Team.Description: BS in Economics from Wharton; M.B.A. from Harvard Business School. Previously Partner at TPG Capital for 6 years, Principal at Bain Capital for 8 years, Engagement Manager at McKinsey for 4 years.

Team.Name: Jonathan Iachetta
Team.Title: VP of Operations
Team.Description: BS in Economics and BS in Engineering from Wharton and the School of Engineering at the University of Pennsylvania; M.B.A. from Harvard Business School. Previously, VP of Business & Labor, former roles at McKinsey and Google.

Team.Name: Milijana Urosevic
Team.Title: VP of People
Team.Description: Previously VP of Enterprise Business Operations & Transformation at Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) & Director HR at HPE. Also held the role of People and HR Operations at Martin's Point.

Team.Name: Martin Picard
Team.Title: VP of Finance and Global Head of Real Estate
Team.Description: CPA, B.Comm. in Accounting from Concordia University. Previously Head of Acquisitions & Real Estate Research, Senior Financial Auditor at Deloitte.

Team.Name: Martin Rouleau
Team.Title: Managing Director of Real Estate
Team.Description: Previously Managing Director of Real Estate Investments at Ivanhoé Cambridge. Held multiple real estate acquisitions roles for the Real Property Association of Canada.

Team.Name: Craig Redman
Team.Title: Sr. Director of Customer Service
Team.Description: BS in Business Administration from the University of Phoenix. Previously VP of Customer Service at TaskRabbit, Director of Customer Service at eBay, and Director of Site Operations at PayPal.

Team.Name: B.A. Heller
Team.Title: Director of Interior Design Operations
Team.Description: BA in Architecture from Yale University, M.B.A. from Harvard Business School. Previously held roles at Walt Disney Imagineering, Director of the Lab at the Walt Disney Imagineering Research & Development Studio, Principal at the Bridgehampton Group, Principal at the ACLU.

Team.Name: Phil Rothenberg
Team.Title: General Counsel
Team.Description: J.D. from New York University; B.A. in Economics and Foreign Affairs from UVA. At MSB for 10 years. Previously VP of Legal Affairs for Tesla for 7 years; Attorney-Advisor at the US Securities and Exchange Commission; Adjunct Professor of Law at Georgetown.

Team.Name: Vivek Subramanian
Team.Title: VP of Product & Engineering
Team.Description: BS in Computer Science from BITS Pilani in India; M.S. from Stanford University. Previously Senior Director of Engineering at Yahoo, Head of Product at Coupa, and Senior Manager at Deloitte Consulting. Co-founder of a startup, held various positions at Oracle and Sabre.

Team.Name: Adrian Sharp
Team.Title: Senior Director of Expansion
Team.Description: BS in Hotel Administration from Cornell University. Previously held roles at Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, including Director of Development, Director of Operations, and Director of Food & Beverage. Co-founder of a startup, held positions at Starwood.

Team.Name: Sasha Nakibin
Team.Title: Director of Real Estate Expansion - Europe
Team.Description: BS in Finance from the University of Illinois. Previously worked at J.P. Morgan in Real Estate Investment Banking, and as an Associate at Hines. Held roles at Morgan Stanley Real Estate Investing.

Team.Name: James Oates
Team.Title: Regional General Manager
Team.Description: BS in Business Administration from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Previously held roles at Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, including Director of Operations, Director of Food & Beverage, and Director of Rooms. Co-founder of a startup, held positions at Starwood.

Team.Name: Marta Higuera
Team.Title: VP of Revenue
Team.Description: BA in Economics and Political Science from Stanford; M.S. in Management from Stanford. Previously held roles at Bain & Company, and as a Senior Manager at Google. Co-founder of a startup, held positions at Google.

Team.Name: Brian Bae
Team.Title: Head of Supply Growth
Team.Description: BS in Finance from the University of Illinois. Previously worked at J.P. Morgan in Real Estate Investment Banking, and as an Associate at Hines. Held roles at Morgan Stanley Real Estate Investing.

Team.Name: Anisha Desai
Team.Title: Director - Investment Analysis & Research
Team.Description: BS in Finance from the University of Illinois. Previously worked at J.P. Morgan in Real Estate Investment Banking, and as an Associate at Hines. Held roles at Morgan Stanley Real Estate Investing.

Team.Name: Jeff Sun
Team.Title: Director of Operations - Supply Chain
Team.Description: BS in Business Administration from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Previously held roles at Amazon, including Director of Operations, Director of Food & Beverage, and Director of Rooms. Co-founder of a startup, held positions at Amazon.

Team.Name: Mason Harrison
Team.Title: Director of Communications
Team.Description: BA in Political Science from Yale University. Previously held roles at Google, including Director of Communications, and as a Senior Manager at Google. Co-founder of a startup, held positions at Google.
